text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Thanks for driving, Producer.

Yeah,
it's been a while since I've been to the beach.

Me too.
Hmm, what a beautiful view!

Hey,
Producer, how about we race to the shoreline?
Huh...?
Hehehe...!

Hey, hey...!
Natsuha!

Haa... haa...
Finally caught up...

You did a good job keeping up.
That's why you're my Producer.

Haha...
Running on the sandy beach was tough though...
And, sand getting into my shoes...

...And,
Natsuha, try not to get your shoes wet with the waves.
It's fine, I'm just at the edge where it won't get wet.
...Natsuha?
...The ocean is truly wonderful, isn't it?

Every time I come here,
it reminds me that there's still so much ahead.

I can see an endless road
stretching out before me...
...You really do have an amazing perspective, Natsuha.
...Do I?
Yeah, I think so.

In this world, there are many who are overwhelmed
by the vastness of the sea and stop in their tracks.

But Natsuha, you see it as an opportunity and have the
strength and courage to move forward... Am I right?
...I'm not doing it alone.

Producer... Because you're by my side,
I can keep moving forward.
Natsuha...

You always chase after me with all your might,
supporting me...

When I come to a halt,
you give me the courage to move forward...

Because you're always there to support me,
I can keep running with all my strength...

...Hey, Natsuha!
The wave is coming to your feet!
Eh—Kyah!?

...
Are you okay?

...Y-Yeah...
Thank you for catching me...

It's fine.
It's my job to support you, after all.

Haha...
Just like you said.
Haha / Hehe...
...Hey, Producer.

Please continue to support me like this,
forever...
